entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Manicouagan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:51 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lac Manouane East 10:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -9.1°C
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: -10.2°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls late this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 08:56 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:56 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:56 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
